definition: lit. when the boat gets to the pier-head, it will go straight with the current (proverb)/fig. everything will be all right/cf 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直|车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直
pinyin: chuan2 dao4 qiao2 tou2 zi4 ran2 zhi2

definition: boat/vessel/ship/CL:條|条[tiao2],艘[sou1],隻|只[zhi1]
variant of 船[chuan2]
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
bridge/CL:座[zuo4]
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

lit. When we get to the mountain, there'll be a way through and when the boat gets to the pier-head, it will go straight with the current. (idiom)/fig. Everything will turn out for the best./Let's worry about it when it happens./It will be all right on the night.
pinyin: che1 dao4 shan1 qian2 bi4 you3 lu4 , chuan2 dao4 qiao2 tou2 zi4 ran2 zhi2
containing_words.word: 车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直

definition: lit. When we get to the mountain, there'll be a way through. (idiom)/fig. Everything will turn out for the best./Let's worry about it when it happens./It will be all right on the night./cf couplet 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直|车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直
pinyin: che1 dao4 shan1 qian2 bi4 you3 lu4

definition: Since they have come, we should make them comfortable (idiom). Since we're here, take it easy./Since this is so, we should accept it./Now we have come, let's stay and take the rough with the smooth./If you can't do anything to prevent it, you might as well sit back and enjoy it.
pinyin: ji4 lai2 zhi1 , ze2 an1 zhi1

definition: the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort/With effort, one can achieve anything.

pinyin: che1 dao4 shan1 qian2 zi4 you3 lu4

definition: lit. silly people get their panties in a bunch (idiom)/fig. to get upset over nothing/to make problems for oneself
to let nature take its course (idiom)
planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: Heaven never bars one's way (idiom); don't despair and you will find a way through./Never give up hope./Never say die.
pinyin: tian1 wu2 jue2 ren2 zhi1 lu4

definition: the future is long (idiom); there will be ample time for that later/We'll cross that bridge when we get there
younger generations will do all right on their own (idiom)
pinyin: er2 sun1 zi4 you3 er2 sun1 fu2

definition: to come to accept an unpleasant fact/to get over sth/to cheer up
if you want sth done well, do it yourself (idiom)
pinyin: qiu2 ren2 bu4 ru2 qiu2 ji3

definition: to insist on/to demand/to impose
take your time/take it easy
Heaven helps the worthy (idiom)
pinyin: ji2 ren2 zi4 you3 tian1 xiang4
